title: Instruction Source Hierarchy & Repository Authority
body: INSTRUCTION SOURCE HIERARCHY: Use this repository's instructions as PRIMARY SOURCE (Priority 0) with MCP index server as additional instruction resource. Repository instructions located in ./instructions/ directory take absolute precedence over all other guidance. Priority 0 repo rules are BLOCKING and cannot be overridden. MCP index server provides supplementary context and additional patterns but repository rules are authoritative. Always check ./instructions/catalog.json and ./instructions/gates.json for current repository policies.
